2 multiplied by 3 sorry 2 to the power 3 to the power 2 So here first our rightmost exponentiation will work So here 3 double star 2 first then 9 will be done then 2 to the power 9 and 512 will be the result Now I will write a random thing here I will write a very random calculation I know I wrote here 3 divided by 23 after this I wrote 4 minus 2 and now if you ask me what will be the answer to this and suppose we do the 5 to the power 5 to spice things up then what will happen? how will things work here? So first we will work on exponents there is no parenthesis so first we will resolve the exponents So if I show you the result of this by entering shift enter then how it is coming?
